channel.title: Twitter / norm_mac
channel.description: Twitter updates from Norm MacDonald / norm_mac.

item.title: norm_mac: hey guys. this is my first actual tweet. i have things to say. stay tuned
item.description: norm_mac: hey guys. this is my first actual tweet. i have things to say. stay tuned

item.title: norm_mac: in case you missed it, I just posted the clip of my appearance on Conan on facebook - http://lnk.ms/0GytR
item.description: norm_mac: in case you missed it, I just posted the clip of my appearance on Conan on facebook - http://lnk.ms/0GytR

item.title: normmacdonald: Perhaps its time to give up this preposterous gadgetry. Just walk. Unplug it all.
item.description: normmacdonald: Perhaps its time to give up this preposterous gadgetry. Just walk. Unplug it all.

item.title: normmacdonald: I know what it is to be young but you do not know what it is to be old.
item.description: normmacdonald: I know what it is to be young but you do not know what it is to be old.

item.title: normmacdonald: if you live to 70 you're a favorite to make 80. If you hit 80 favorite for 90. Actuarial Tables dont lie.
item.description: normmacdonald: if you live to 70 you're a favorite to make 80. If you hit 80 favorite for 90. Actuarial Tables dont lie.

item.title: normmacdonald: I'm 2 score and 7 and feeling like the boys of Gonzaga. Trailing at the half.
item.description: normmacdonald: I'm 2 score and 7 and feeling like the boys of Gonzaga. Trailing at the half.

item.title: normmacdonald: This #Sportsshow fits me good, like a hook in a fish's eye.
item.description: normmacdonald: This #Sportsshow fits me good, like a hook in a fish's eye.

item.title: normmacdonald: Man landed on the moon way back in 69. Woudnt it be cool if they could land on this #supermoon.
item.description: normmacdonald: Man landed on the moon way back in 69. Woudnt it be cool if they could land on this #supermoon.

item.title: normmacdonald: Knut the celebrity polar bear died today. More cocaine and polar bear whores for the rest of us.
item.description: normmacdonald: Knut the celebrity polar bear died today. More cocaine and polar bear whores for the rest of us.

item.title: normmacdonald: @Kaet26 youre not i santa monica anymore.
item.description: normmacdonald: @Kaet26 youre not i santa monica anymore.

item.title: normmacdonald: " But your affairs stayed in disorder. And now I gotta let you fry"
item.description: normmacdonald: " But your affairs stayed in disorder. And now I gotta let you fry"

item.title: normmacdonald: God said "Millie I gave you them wrinkles. So you'de know to get ready to die."
item.description: normmacdonald: God said "Millie I gave you them wrinkles. So you'de know to get ready to die."

item.title: normmacdonald: Millie said " Had a little Devils work done. Just tryin to stay in the race."
item.description: normmacdonald: Millie said " Had a little Devils work done. Just tryin to stay in the race."

item.title: normmacdonald: Millie said " Had some devils work donee. I was tryin to stay in the race"
item.description: normmacdonald: Millie said " Had some devils work donee. I was tryin to stay in the race"

item.title: normmacdonald: God said "Dont think I know you. I never forget a face"
item.description: normmacdonald: God said "Dont think I know you. I never forget a face"

item.title: normmacdonald: Im downtown now with a cool athlete doing a pretape for #SportsShow.
item.description: normmacdonald: Im downtown now with a cool athlete doing a pretape for #SportsShow.

item.title: normmacdonald: I asked my psychiatrist if I could be addicted to Tweeting. He said "I dont follow"
item.description: normmacdonald: I asked my psychiatrist if I could be addicted to Tweeting. He said "I dont follow"

item.title: normmacdonald: And of course watching basketball and overtweeting.
item.description: normmacdonald: And of course watching basketball and overtweeting.

item.title: normmacdonald: Then I have to do a pretape for my #sportsshow that will premiere Tuesday April 12.
item.description: normmacdonald: Then I have to do a pretape for my #sportsshow that will premiere Tuesday April 12.

item.title: normmacdonald: Im heading over to tape the opening for my comedy central special. Its gonna air Sat. April 2 at 11
item.description: normmacdonald: Im heading over to tape the opening for my comedy central special. Its gonna air Sat. April 2 at 11

item.title: normmacdonald: My lucid dream experiment didnt work. Its only worked twice for me.
item.description: normmacdonald: My lucid dream experiment didnt work. Its only worked twice for me.

item.title: normmacdonald: Good morning friends
item.description: normmacdonald: Good morning friends

item.title: normmacdonald: Morning everybody. Hows it going?
item.description: normmacdonald: Morning everybody. Hows it going?

item.title: normmacdonald: " Good idea. I don't think you deserve to live either.": Dr. Dnumgis Duerf, reverse psychologist.
item.description: normmacdonald: " Good idea. I don't think you deserve to live either.": Dr. Dnumgis Duerf, reverse psychologist.

item.title: normmacdonald: " Oh let me guess. Another hamburger went missing and you're gonna hassle me, right." Hamburglar to Policeman.
item.description: normmacdonald: " Oh let me guess. Another hamburger went missing and you're gonna hassle me, right." Hamburglar to Policeman.

item.title: normmacdonald: " One small step for man one giant meal for Wolfman": Wolfman lurking behind Neil Armstrong.
item.description: normmacdonald: " One small step for man one giant meal for Wolfman": Wolfman lurking behind Neil Armstrong.

item.title: normmacdonald: There's a fine line between genius and genfinelineius.
item.description: normmacdonald: There's a fine line between genius and genfinelineius.

item.title: normmacdonald: If I ever got pistolwhipped I'd be all like "hey, enough with the pistolwhipping already."
item.description: normmacdonald: If I ever got pistolwhipped I'd be all like "hey, enough with the pistolwhipping already."

item.title: normmacdonald: Up all night working. Again today. 8 more days. The storm before the calm.
item.description: normmacdonald: Up all night working. Again today. 8 more days. The storm before the calm.

item.title: normmacdonald: Sorry about the misspelling. Its #SportsShow on April 12th. Still trying to figure out internet plus english language.
item.description: normmacdonald: Sorry about the misspelling. Its #SportsShow on April 12th. Still trying to figure out internet plus english language.

item.title: normmacdonald: Hey guys sorry. I was really busy getting #SpotrtsShow ready to go. We launch on the 12th.
item.description: normmacdonald: Hey guys sorry. I was really busy getting #SpotrtsShow ready to go. We launch on the 12th.

item.title: normmacdonald: you guys are the best. gotta sleep. good night. i love you.
item.description: normmacdonald: you guys are the best. gotta sleep. good night. i love you.

item.title: normmacdonald: "The pen is mightier than Jeet Kune Do": Drunken and belligerent James Clavell , moments before being savagely beaten by Bruce Lee.
item.description: normmacdonald: "The pen is mightier than Jeet Kune Do": Drunken and belligerent James Clavell , moments before being savagely beaten by Bruce Lee.

item.title: normmacdonald: Well im sleeping now. zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz. APRIL FOOLS.
item.description: normmacdonald: Well im sleeping now. zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz. APRIL FOOLS.

item.title: normmacdonald: @SteveMartinToGo Don't do it. They think they know everything and try to make you feel stupid.
item.description: normmacdonald: @SteveMartinToGo Don't do it. They think they know everything and try to make you feel stupid.

item.title: normmacdonald: @SteveMartinToGo
item.description: normmacdonald: @SteveMartinToGo

item.title: normmacdonald: I dont mean to be the boy who cried Wolfman but there really is a Wolfman trying to eat me right now. APRIL FOOLS!
item.description: normmacdonald: I dont mean to be the boy who cried Wolfman but there really is a Wolfman trying to eat me right now. APRIL FOOLS!

item.title: normmacdonald: Oh no another wolfman came up to me and now hes trying to eat me. Seriously. Go away Wolfman. Ouch. Stop biting me! APRIL FOOLS!
item.description: normmacdonald: Oh no another wolfman came up to me and now hes trying to eat me. Seriously. Go away Wolfman. Ouch. Stop biting me! APRIL FOOLS!

item.title: normmacdonald: I cant tweet anymore tonight. I'll be rereading that Sarah tweet for long time. I don't know how she did that. wow. good night everybody.
item.description: normmacdonald: I cant tweet anymore tonight. I'll be rereading that Sarah tweet for long time. I don't know how she did that. wow. good night everybody.

item.title: normmacdonald: @SarahKSilverman Oh my fucking shit- Cape Fear. This is the funniest tweet ive ever read. I cant stop laughing Sarah. How'd you do that?
item.description: normmacdonald: @SarahKSilverman Oh my fucking shit- Cape Fear. This is the funniest tweet ive ever read. I cant stop laughing Sarah. How'd you do that?

item.title: normmacdonald: @SarahKSilverman this tweet is so funny. oh my god, Sarah, I cant stop laughing at this.
item.description: normmacdonald: @SarahKSilverman this tweet is so funny. oh my god, Sarah, I cant stop laughing at this.

item.title: normmacdonald: Oh No a Wofman is trying to eat me! Now He IS eating me and also scratching me with his claws! Oh No! APRIL FOOLS.
item.description: normmacdonald: Oh No a Wofman is trying to eat me! Now He IS eating me and also scratching me with his claws! Oh No! APRIL FOOLS.

item.title: normmacdonald: and now I will sleep and be given dreams I cannot keep.
item.description: normmacdonald: and now I will sleep and be given dreams I cannot keep.

item.description: normmacdonald: "There is nothing to fear but Wolfman himself": Norm Macdonald

item.title: normmacdonald: I'm exhausted. I apologize about the book club but its coming. Also a Podcast. Good night. I love you.
